sections.title: Setup
sections.text:
Download the loader here: https://tzproject.com/

Download our support tool here: https://mega.nz/file/ioJQ3TAK#khDxBBZ0_LiX__6zEnfr2N6PG1_HDuv271J5rFus7yQ

Head over to https://tzproject.com/ and create an account

Login to your account and activate your key

download the loader and follow the instructions provided
